title: Protect your email data with this comprehensive backup app
content:
With so much of your professional communication done over email, you need something in place that can keep your email safe from data loss. Mail Backup X Individual Edition is an all-encompassing email backup app, and during Pre-Black Friday Doorbusters, it’s on sale for $34.99 (Reg. $179.99) with coupon code APPS30.

Mail Backup X will back up mail across platforms and mail services. Apple Mail, Outlook, Office 365, Gmail, and many other major emailing services are made safe with Mail Backup X. You can also archive files, compress archives, import your mail from those archives, and send your backups to multiple cloud services. Your data is doubly protected with Mail Backup X’s powerful encryption service, military-grade AES 256-bit encryption with your own private key. Your email is the key to so much of your most important information, and with Mail Backup X, you can bet on all that information remaining safe, even during catastrophic data loss.
